${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:OfTheVoidRelic.NAME: Of the Void
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a #yVoid card, #y${modID}:Hunger #b1 and heal #b1 hp.

${modID}:BrokenBlade.NAME: Broken Blade
DESCRIPTIONS: damage to the enemy with the least health. If this kills the enemy, gain #b1 Obsidian. Activatable once per combat.

${modID}:ObsidianSword.NAME: Obsidian Sword
${modID}:ObsidianSword.FLAVOR: A sword as black as night.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click to activate. Deal damage equal to your obsidian stacks to the enemy with the least health, then gain #b1 Obsidian. Activatable once per combat.
